channel.title: Facing different direction?
channel.description: Is it possible to make it so when you teleport you end up facing a different direction besides south. I know you can change which way objects face, so there must be a way to change which way the character faces.

item.title: Facing different direction?
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“cwg452003, post:1, topic:218218”]Is it possible to make it so when you teleport you end up facing a different direction besides south. I know you can change which way objects face, so there must be a way to change which way the character faces.[/quote]I doubt you have seen this in RuneScape.

Read full topic
